member.name: IPSFactoryBuffer.CreateProxy
member.summary: Creates a proxy for the specified remote interface.
member.param: A controlling interface; used for aggregation.
The identifier of the interface to proxy.
A pointer to an interface to control marshaling.
A pointer to the interface specified by riid.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IPSFactoryBuffer.CreateStub
member.summary: Creates a stub for the remote use of the specified interface.
member.param: The identifier of the interface for which a stub is to be created.
A controlling interface; used for aggregation.
A pointer to an interface pointer to control marshaling.
member.returns: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_OUTOFMEMORY, E_UNEXPECTED, E_FAIL, and S_OK.

member.name: IPSFactoryBuffer
member.summary: Provides custom methods for the creation of COM object proxies and stubs. This interface is not marshalable.
